stepTitle: If the rocket sled shown in the figure starts with only one rocket burning, what is the magnitude of its acceleration $$\frac{m}{s^2}$$? Assume that the mass of the system is $$2100$$ kg, the thrust T is $$2.4$$ $$x$$ $${10}^4$$ N, and the force of friction opposing the motion is known to be $$650$$ N. Round up to the nearest whole number.
